channel.title: Drop glitch For trisidiax Vistix and More hopefully

item.title: Drop glitch For trisidiax Vistix and More hopefully
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:6, topic:464456”]So the prayer system has a dupe? You can’t have a more poorly-programmed server than that…

Also if that’s the case, this would never work. Anyone can decompile the client and re-add this back in. There’s no check to see if this is actually being initialized. You’re not stopping it, you’re hiding it.[/quote]

This. There are a lot of little reverse engineers here on Mopar.

Read full topic
item.source: Drop glitch For trisidiax Vistix and More hopefully

item.title: Drop glitch For trisidiax Vistix and More hopefully
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

So the prayer system has a dupe? You can’t have a more poorly-programmed server than that…

Also if that’s the case, this would never work. Anyone can decompile the client and re-add this back in. There’s no check to see if this is actually being initialized. You’re not stopping it, you’re hiding it.

Read full topic

item.title: Drop glitch For trisidiax Vistix and More hopefully
item.dc:creator: @kidgoku4522 kidgoku4522
item.description:
@kidgoku4522 wrote:

released the fix, hopefully this time I will get more replys. Anyway this works 100%. If you are having any problems with the compile or anything else, it’s not my problem that you cant delete some simple things.

I usually saw this on trisidiax , realityscape, vistex and insidiax , or idk their names exactly.

Client side obviously. Open up client.java hit ctrl+f and search for

private void processMinimapActions() {
Somewhere in that void search for the following

if (super.mouseY >= 233 && super.mouseY <= 242) {
if(super.mouseX >= 550 && super.mouseX <= 563){
if(!praySelected) {
menuActionName[2] = “Select”;
} else if(praySelected){
menuActionName[2] = “Unselect”;
}
menuActionID[2] = 18026;
menuActionRow = 2;
}
if(super.mouseX >= 590 && super.mouseX <= 600){
if(!praySelected) {
menuActionName[2] = “Select”;
} else if(praySelected){
menuActionName[2] = “Unselect”;
}
menuActionID[2] = 18027;
menuActionRow = 2;
}
if(super.mouseX >= 630 && super.mouseX <= 637){
if(!praySelected) {
menuActionName[2] = “Select”;
} else if(praySelected){
menuActionName[2] = “Unselect”;
}
menuActionID[2] = 18028;
menuActionRow = 2;
}
}
And delete them.

Compile , run , test.

Read full topic
